summary: Fixed MSVC compilation errors in heightfield terrain decoration by correcting the ridge pillar spacing check (removed an accidental reference to an out-of-scope variable).
Added a deterministic SpatialHashGrid2D helper for fast minimum-distance placement checks and applied it to ridge pillar and scree cluster center selection.
Removed now-unused separation-squared locals that became redundant after the spatial hash refactor.
notes: SpatialHashGrid2D is a fixed-bucket grid (no unordered_map) designed for deterministic procgen passes and fast O(k) neighbor checks.
The ridge pillar + scree cluster placement rules remain unchanged (still uses strict distSq < r*r), but the new implementation is harder to break and scales better on larger maps.
